column4: Hi all. Is there a program or any way to help configure my battery on my laptop? I am new to Ubuntu and have noticed my battery does not last as long as it did on XP. Any idea's why?
various 'eneryg saving' functions may not be enabled

How do I enable energy saving options? and can I possibly set different profiles that I can switch to when using battery power? It would be quite annoying having to change the settings everytime I switch to battery power.
sry cannot help you further.. not using ubuntu myself on my laptop/desktops anylonger... but try google if noone here answers
